attributes.action: Cancel GCSE/A-Level/Vocational exams for students in 2021
attributes.additional_details: With the current coronavirus situation, I feel that exams should be cancelled, in particular if we end up in the exact same/similar situation that we were in this March. The measures of Centre Assessed Grades were much more effective and more of an accurate representation of students capabilities and work.
attributes.background: Cancel GCSE/A-Level/Vocational exams for students in 2021
